title: Pulp Fiction
content:
I'm looking for a good reference for old pulp novel covers, either online or in print. You know the type - true crime stories and such. Thanks in advance.

- Lex
author: Lex Kominek

comments.content:
Cheers, Paul. Those are perfect.

- Lex

Lex, for what it's worth, Leslie Cabarga has a go at this on p.92 of the Logo, Font & Lettering Bible. The original he reproduces on the same page is the wonderfully titled 'Judas Incorporated' published by Dell in the '40s.
